heading: HB03375
0: OMNIBUS HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ACT
short-title: Omnibus Housing And Urban Development Act Of 2016
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11201 enacted on 2019-02-14 Substituted by HB06775
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03375
FULL TITLE : OMNIBUS HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ACT
SHORT TITLE : Omnibus Housing And Urban Development Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Seeks to create a Department of Housing and Urban Development through the consolidation of the Housing and Urban Development Coordinating Council (HUDCC) and the Housing and Land Regulatory Board (HLURB), which shall act as the primary national government entity responsible for the management of housing and urban development.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-08-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Bulut-Begtang (010 2017-08-14)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2017-01-25
          -Created a Technical Working Group
      2. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-03-13
      3. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-10-03
      4. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-10-03
          -Substitute Bill to House Bills Numbered 449, 1518, 1721, 3375, 3639 and 5114 was approved with amendments.
MOTHER BILL: HB06775
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION ON 2016-11-28
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
